# Problem 2

helpful tip - "r eval=FALSE" in "{r}"(will not run code but display it)

```{r}
rich <- 1
```

# Problem 3


```{r}
array1 <- 1
for(i in 2:100){
  array1 <-c(array1, i)
}
array1
```
*returns a set of numbers (all real numbers)

**alternatively**
```{r}
array2 <- seq(1,100)
array2
```
*returns a set of integers

# Problem 4

```{r}
array3 <- sum(seq(1,100))
array3
```

# Problem 5 

```{r}
mySum<- function (x,y) {
  sumVector <- sum(seq(x,y))
  return(sumVector)
}

mySum(1,5)
```
